name: Space Fruitventure
description:
A game were you play as a little guy in a spaceship, who lost his fruit in space! Help him get his fruit back by shooting and dodging meteors!

This game was made for a final project, in a C# class.

I was going to make it a webGL game so people could play it on itch, but for some reason it didn't let me play the game when it was uploaded. I probably did something wrong at some point, but I'm not sure what I can do at this point. Until I figure out what happened, you'll just have to play the download version
